name: Energy Scraps
description:
!!!Press TAB to lock/unlock mouse cursor

________________________________________

Created for the 39th Ludum Dare Game Jam.

You had emergency landing and you're almost out of energy to support yourself. Explore

surroundings, recharge and upgrade your systems and finally repair the ship and get out of here!

- Draw energy from power cells
- spend energy to improve your stats
- reach distant areas
- watch out for enemies
- find hidden energy cells
- open locked doors by charging in energy

Rate it here:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/energy-scraps
